original_title: 5 minutes de plaisir, 30 ans d'emmerdes. Les ados
overview: When the teenagers are not there, the parents take advantage of it! Their rooms are going to be combed through... a thorough search like you see in American series! Between a father hen who forgives everything and a hyperactive mother who suspects the worst, the romantic evening will turn into a settling of scores, and go to hell for our greatest pleasure!
title: 5 minutes of fun, 30 years of shit, teens
